title: Minimal impact of healthcare costs on poverty
description: In 2016, only 0.01% of Uruguay's population was pushed below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket healthcare expenditures, indicating minimal financial burden from healthcare costs.

title: Negligible external health expenditure
description: In 2021, Uruguay's external health expenditure was only 0.00015186% of its current health expenditure, showing a very low reliance on external funding for healthcare.

title: Lengthy process for obtaining an operating license
description: In 2017, it took 176 days to obtain an operating license in Uruguay, indicating a lengthy bureaucratic process.
